member.name: OLEINPLACEFRAMEINFO
member.summary: Contains information about the accelerators supported by a container during an in-place session. The structure is used in the method and the function.

member.name: OLEINPLACEFRAMEINFO.cb
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes. The object server must specify sizeof(OLEINPLACEFRAMEINFO) in the structure it passes to . The container can then use this size to determine the structure's version.

member.name: OLEINPLACEFRAMEINFO.fMDIApp
member.summary: Indicates whether the container is an MDI application.

member.name: OLEINPLACEFRAMEINFO.hwndFrame
member.summary: A handle to the container's top-level frame window.

member.name: OLEINPLACEFRAMEINFO.haccel
member.summary: A handle to the accelerator table that the container wants to use during an in-place editing session.

member.name: OLEINPLACEFRAMEINFO.cAccelEntries
member.summary: The number of accelerators in haccel.
